snippet.title: Project Wingman Alpha Demo
snippet.description:
If you liked PS2 era Ace Combat games you will love Project Wingman. Made by one guy in his free time, this indie arcade flight game made in UE4 might be the only good Ace-Combat-like game PC gamers get. Yes, Assault Horizon was dreadful. The only good thing AC:AH bring was the OST. Fortunately AC7 is coming back to strangereal and I hope the gameplay will be more like the older titles as well. But lets get back on topic. The game is still in alpha stage, the cockpits are not finished, but overall gameplay is solid and fun. 

I have added some BGM from AC4, 5, 0 and AH as the game doesn't include any music yet.

NOTE: I'm not the developer of this game, I just made this video. For any questions regarding the game ask the developer!

Developer site:
http://rb-d2.tumblr.com/

Download the demo here:
https://rb-d2.itch.io/wingman

Project Wingman Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIku_oD9y-RDl6gFKVsLJjorKP0NJiOcj

Soundtrack used in this video was taken from Ace Combat 4, Ace Combat 5, Ace Combat Zero and Ace Combat Assault Horizon by Project Aces and Namco Bandai. No copyright infringement is intended. This video is for entertainment purposes only.
